name: 2.0.0.Final
body:
- [**Task**] Remove Docker Maven Plugin [#1377](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1377)
- [**closed**] Installation error [#1376](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1376)
- [**Impacts Documentation**][**Question**] Differences between using kafka storage and kafka stream storage for Apicurio [#1370](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1370)
- [**Question**] General questions about schema registry [#1360](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1360)
- [**2.0.x**][**Impacts Documentation**] Add configuration properties to the maven plugin for configuring authentication client credentials [#1357](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1357)
- [**Question**] Cannot deserialize LocalDate from Integer in Avro format by Apicurio deserializer [#1327](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1327)
- [**2.0.x**] Add feature to disable (entirely) the UI [#1326](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1326)
- [**Discussion**] Implement helm-chart or operator [#1325](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1325)
- [**Enhancement**] Allow String as Version ID [#1324](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1324)
- [**Bug**] Postgresql Persistence Exception : logconfiguration [#1323](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1323)
- [**closed**] JSON compatibility check for "contains" keyword in "array" type [#1319](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1319)
- [**2.0.x**][**Bug**] 2.0.0.RC1 - /apis/registry/v2/search/artifacts HTTP 500 error [#1315](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1315)
- [**Enhancement**] Make RegistryClient smart to populate the v2 base API path [#1311](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1311)
- [**closed**] apicurio/apicurio-registry-sql image in docker hub seems to be broken [#1300](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1300)
- [**2.0.x**][**Bug**] Maven plugin test-update goal is not working [#1248](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1248)
- [**2.0.x**][**Enhancement**] Add "supportsMultiTenancy" feature to storage layer [#1237](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1237)
- [**2.0.x**][**Enhancement**] Add feature flags to enable/disable compat APIs [#1236](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1236)
- [**Discussion**] Extract JSON compatibility checking code into a separate module [#1214](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1214)
- [**2.0.x**][**Enhancement**][**Impacts Documentation**] Add bearer and basic working together support [#1154](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1154)
- [**Enhancement**] Create Version info endpoint to the REST API [#1142](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1142)
- [**Documentation**] [Suggestion] Documentation should mention that particular section is related only to Java [#1121](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1121)
- [**Task**] Create parent for storage modules to share [#802](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/802)
- [**2.0.x**][**Discussion**] Same schema registered to multiple subjects - multiple global IDs - different behavior compared to Confluent Schema Registry [#796](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/796)
- [**2.0.x**][**Bug**][**UI**] UI - unclear search results (search by label) [#652](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/652)
- [**closed**] Create nightly job to run against Quarkus master [#268](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/268)
